cause.description:
Our goal is to reach out to more potential voters in the 2008 presidential election. We believe Barack Obama is a leader with almost a Kennedy-esque mystique and rhetoric who is clearly the most apt presidential candidate.
1. Barack Obama is the best candidate in the 2008 election
2. Obama is the rare breed of politician that has both electability and integrity
3. All the other candidates suck
cause.name: Obama 08
